name: blooming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A person who is blooming has a healthy, energetic, and attractive appearance: Jo looked really well, positively blooming.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Animal physiology: fit & healthy
used to emphasize a noun, adverb, or adjective, or to express anger: It's a blooming disgrace! I'm not going to bloomin' well apologize to him!
